ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Tranix Crown Disappointment.....
ygData.msgSnippet: What a bunch of dorks :)  Of course they should have let you roll on it. Some people are just strange though. Rokenn
ygData.messageBody:
What a bunch of dorks :) Of course they should have let you roll on it.
Some people are just strange though.

Rokenn

> -----Original Message-----
> From: John_Senior@... [mailto:John_Senior@...]
> Sent: Thursday, April 13, 2000 8:05 AM
> To: eqbards@egroups.com
> Subject: [eqbards] Tranix Crown Disappointment.....
>
>
> Last night on Veeshan a few members from 3-4 guilds
> participated in a Fire
> Giant run, there were about 7 from our guild and 18 people in
> total so we
> had more than enough, things went well and the first giants
> were killed
> easily, our monk puller was doing an excellent job and managed to pull
> Tranix solo, the crown was dropped and I asked to be in the
> roll for it,
> there was only myself and an enchanter there that would use
> it to it's full
> potential. But instead it was decided that the enchanter
> should get to keep
> the item and that I shouldn't get to roll for it.
>
> I was really angry to be treated like this especially as we
> have just got a
> new charm song, the tranix crown would of been great.
>
> I just thought I would post this here and see whether you
> guys and girls
> think I should of got to roll for this item?
>
> Madagan Songweaver, Bard of 44.8 Songs <Guardians of Light>
> Veeshan Server
>
>
>
